txt_en: It's April Fools' Day. If I believe you, I'm a noodle.
txt_cn: 今天是愚人节，如果我相信你，我就是个傻瓜。

txt_en: A friend is easier lost than found.
A drizzling rain falls like tears on the Mourning Day.
The best way to achieve a goal is to devote 100% of your time and energy to it.
txt_cn: 达到目标的最好办法就是投入百分之百的时间和精力！

txt_en: A good beginning makes a good ending.
Don’t lose hope.You never know what tomorrow brings.
txt_cn: 别灰心，谁又知道明天会有怎样的惊喜。 --《摩登家庭》

txt_en: Think less of gain and loss as long as you go all out and have a clear mind.
txt_cn: 得失成败置之度外，只求竭尽所能，无愧于心。 --傅雷

txt_en: The task will be hard. There may be dark days ahead.
txt_cn: 任务将会困难重重，前路可能乌云密布 。

txt_en: You can't obtain something for nothing.
txt_cn: 没有付出就没有收获。 --《小美人鱼》

txt_en: All good things come to those who wait.
txt_cn: 所有美好的事物都值得等待。 --《浪人》

txt_en: No man is born wise or learned.
Beauty lies in the love's eyes.
